notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Ka noho ingoakore ō ihirangi i roto i ngā rā 7 mō
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Ka noho ingoakore me te pūranga ō ihirangi katoa i tēnei hapori i roto i ngā rā 7, whai muri iho kāore koe e āhei te muku, te huri rānei. Tirohia ō ihirangi i raro.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Ka noho ingoakore me te pūranga ō ihirangi katoa i tēnei rōpū i roto i ngā rā 7, whai muri iho kāore koe e āhei te muku, te huri rānei. Tirohia ō ihirangi i raro.

post.statusChangeSubject: Kua huri te tūnga o te pou

email.possibleFraudFooter: Pāwhiritia te hononga hapori i raro nei, takiuru hei admin ka tīpako i te Whakahaere Tinihanga mai i te tahua.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Te maha o ngā ngohe tinihanga pea me te tūponotanga 75% o te tinihanga
email.possibleFraudInformation: Kua tautuhia e tō mātou pūnaha aunoa he ngohe tinihanga pea. Ka taea e koe te titiro ake mā te atanga admin Hapori. Tērā pea he take kore tinihanga ētahi o ēnei ngohe nō reira kia tupato ki te tirotiro i mua i te mukunga o ihirangi.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Kua tohua aunoatia tēnei ihirangi hei paitini mā ngā algorithms AI e whakatau ana i te paitinitanga o te ihirangi. Ka taea e koe te muku i te ihirangi mena e tika ana.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Kua tohua aunoatia e tētahi algorithm AI he āhuatanga ataata e hono ana ki tēnei ihirangi. Ka arotake tēnei algorithm i ngā whakaahua mō ngā āhuatanga pakeke, whakarekereke, hauora, me ngā āhuatanga whakaihiihi. Ka taea e koe te muku i te ihirangi mena e tika ana.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: I etahi wa ka tatau he kaute he te algorithm AI, i taua keehi kaua e manukanuka, kaore koe e hiahia ki te mahi atu me te taea te wareware i tenei imeera.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Kuputuhi Ingarihi i whakamahia mo te kaute
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Kua taapirihia he tohu hou ki tenei whakaaro
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Kua taapirihia he tohu hou ki to whakaaro
email.writtenByUser: I tuhia e te kaiwhakamahi ko
email.hasBeenReported: kua ripoata mo te takahi i nga tikanga
email.youCanViewItHere: Ka taea e koe te tiro i konei
email.postReport: I pūrongo te whakaaro mō te takahi i ngā tikanga
email.pointReport: I pūrongo te tohu mō te takahi i ngā tikanga
email.user_invite_1: Kua tonoa koe ki te whai wāhi ki...
email.user_invite_2: Pāwhiritia te hono, whakapirihia rānei ki te pae wāhitau o te pūtirotiro hei whakaae i te tono
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Tohu i te whakaaro kāore i āwhina mō taku whakaaro
email.pointUnhelpful: Tohu i te whakaaro kāore i āwhina
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Tohu i te whakaaro i āwhina mō taku whakaaro
email.pointHelpful: Tohu i te whakaaro i āwhina
email.reset_password_1: Anei te hono ki te huri i tō kupuhipa.
email.reset_password_2: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i tēnei, tēnā koa warewarehia tēnei īmēra.
email.reset_password_3: Kāore tō kupuhipa e huri kia uru koe ki te hono i runga ake nei ka hanga hou i tētahi.
